abstract: NFL Roundup; Tampa Bay Buccaneers defeat Indianapolis Colts, 24-17; other results noted.
snippet: Josh Freeman’s 287 yards passing and LeGarrette Blount’s 127 yards rushing led Tampa Bay past the Indianapolis Colts, 24-17.
lead_paragraph: Josh Freeman’s 287 yards passing and LeGarrette Blount’s 127 yards rushing led Tampa Bay past the Indianapolis Colts, 24-17.

headline.main: Freeman and Buccaneers Win Their Third Straight
headline.print_headline: Freeman and Buccaneers Win Their Third Straight
headline.seo: Freeman Leads Buccaneers to Third Straight Victory
